FuncDef:
The fec mode none command disables the Base-R FEC or RS-FEC function on an interface.
The undo fec mode none command restores the default FEC configuration on an interface.
The undo fec mode command restores the default FEC mode on an interface. The fec mode none command disables the Base-R FEC or RS-FEC function on an interface. The undo fec mode none command restores the default FEC configuration on an interface. The undo fec mode command restores the default FEC mode on an interface. By default, the FEC status depends on the medium type and auto-negotiation status.
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,100GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,25GE interface view,400GE-L2 view,400GE interface view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo: You can run the display interface command in any view or the display this interface command in the interface view to check whether the FEC function is enabled on an interface based on the Fec field in the command output.
